example.name: autogen1
example.text: On the way to that goal , she received her first U.S. paycheck for proofreading a book of Polish poetry , attended secretarial school , then went to work for a fund-raising organization .
example.arg: for proofreading a book of Polish poetry

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the paychecks of certain farm workers currently exempt from withholding
example.arg: of certain farm workers currently exempt from withholding
